name: CK Corporation
overview:
Established in year 2006, we, “C K Corporation”, are among the distinguished organization engaged in manufacturing and supplying Thermal Paper Rolls And Machine Rolls. The range offered by us comprises ATM Paper Rolls, POS Rolls, Fax Rolls, Bus Ticketing Rolls, Lottery Rolls, Carbonless Paper Rolls and ECG Rolls.

Management Team: Experienced professionals Quality experts Sales and marketing executives Administrators

Quality Assurance: Abiding by the ethical norms of the industry, we focus on offering qualitative products to the customers. The products offered by us are manufactured by employing advanced machines and utilizing high quality material.

Our Infrastructure: We have constructed a sophisticated infrastructure, sprawling over a vast area of and and well equipped with modern machines. Our infrastructure enables us in completing all our trade tasks at a single place and in an effective manner. We have installed advanced machines and tools at our infrastructure, in order to have hassle free production process. Along with this, our infrastructure enables us in prompt delivery of all our products, as it is well connected with different modes of transportation.

Client Satisfaction: We are a customer oriented organization and so for the reason strive to attain maximum satisfaction of the patrons. In order to achieve the same, we offer premium quality products to the customers at feasible prices.
